name: The Martian Inspection
description:
After witnessing two consecutive world wars and escalating conflicts between the USA and the Soviet Union, the extra-terrestrial Martian society has become terrified of ending up on the receiving end of human missiles should their secluded lives on Mars be uncovered. Martians wouldn't be able to defend themselves; they will let you know they are pacifists.

You play as a small alien, sent to earth to inspect a normal familie in the 1950'ies.

This game was made as a group project for Game World Design class in the Master of games at ITU. Contributors:

  • Thomas Volden: Producer and concept art
  • Mark Staun Poulsen: Narrative design and writing
  • Oliver Astrup: Audio
  • Viktoria Bettina Pittner: Models and props
  • Eskild Lykke: Game design and Director VO
  • Mikkel Ditlevsen: Tech lead
  • Christian Hvidkjær: Scanner and level design

Special thanks to:

  •  Lani Feldstedt: Voice of Barbara
  • Nathan Meister: Voice of Bobby
